Package pyp_metrics

pyp_metrics contains a set of procedures for calculating metrics on PyPedal pedigree objects. More...

Detailed Description

pyp_metrics contains a set of procedures for calculating metrics on PyPedal pedigree objects.

These metrics include coefficients of inbreeding and relationship as well as effective founder number, effective population size, and effective ancestor number.
